segments.text: Hey , Tom . I saw this ad in the paper . You should take a look .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's for a job . It looks perfect for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . Wanted , manager for up-and-coming firm . Must have good organizational skills . Experience a plus . Please contact Susan Lee . Oh , I don't know ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on ! What have you got to lose ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here , I â€™ ll help you type one up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks , Mary . You are real pal . I'll call now to set up an interview .
segments.speaker: S2
